name: Gas-E-Pop (Fan Game)
description:
IMPORTANT: This is a game I made for two reasons...

  • One was to learn how to use unity
  • Second, because I was bored...

So don't take the game too seriously, other than that enjoy and I hope you like it!

ALSO IMPORTANT: I didn't create the game character idea or the Gas-E-Pop thing, the whole game is based on a super old episode from "Neurotically Yours" by iLL WiLL PrEss called "Gas-E-Pop".

Sprites, sounds and music were taken mostly from Open Game Art and mdified when needed by me. All assets used are properly creddited in the .txt file thats included with the game.
